info.name: Menu button transparent with Firefox icon
info.description: Make the Firefox menu button transparent and with icon only. Fits style 33773 with Fully Transparent option from user 15980.
info.additionalInfo:
Made menu button part in style 33391 work for Firefox 4.0 and 4.2a (070411). Tested on wow64 and win64.

Thanks user 55952.
